page.title: 08INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: There is one Library which is described as a "Joint_Use School and Public Library" serving the area around Meopham and also Meopham School. It has a fully integrated stock so that everything in the Library is available to pupils of the School who are aged between ll _ l6 and members of the public alike. Meopham Library was opened in l975 and contains approximately 2OOOO books and subscribes to l7 periodicals. The 4OOO registered borrowers are served by one full_time and one part_time librarian and four part_time library assistants.
